entry.title: Features in NexT
entry.content: NexT Docs .NexT Search . Enable Search functionInstall plugin hexo-generator-searchdb1$ npm install hexo-generator-searchdb --save Edit root _config.yml12345search: path: search.xml field: post format: html limit: 10000 Edit themes _config.yml12local_search: enable: true Restart & Verify localhost:40001$ hexo server Or Install plugin hexo-generator-search1$ npm install hexo-generator-search Edit root _config.yml1234search: path: search.xml field: post content: true Edit themes _config.yml12local_search: enable: true Restart & Verify localhost:40001$ hexo server Enable Copy functionEdit themes _config.yml123codeblock: copy_button: enable: true Restart & Verify localhost:40001$ hexo server

entry.title: Set up your own SS
entry.content: Create Vultr account & ServerRegister with Vultr & Verify your accountLogin Vultr Pay with AliPay Create your serversChoose Server Location Choose Server Type & Server Size Choose Addtional Features, Startup Script & SSH Keys Click Deploy Now & Wait completion Connect to your cloud serverOpen CMD or PowerShell1$ ping <IP Address> SSH to your VPS1$ ssh root@<IP Address> Set up shadowsocks on cloud serverInstall Shadowsocks123$ wget --no-check-certificate -O shadowsocks.sh https://raw.githubusercontent.com/teddysun/shadowsocks_install/master/shadowsocks.sh$ chmod +x shadowsocks.sh$ ./shadowsocks.sh 2>&1 | tee shadowsocks.log Completed. Below is the sample output:12345678Congratulations, Shadowsocks-python server install completed!Your Server IP : xxx.xxx.xxx.xxxYour Server Port : xxxxxYour Password : xxxxxxYour Encryption Method: xxx-xxx-xxxWelcome to visit:https://teddysun.com/342.htmlEnjoy it! Get shadowsocks client for windowsDownload the latest Shadowsocks for windows Connect to your SS server using the output aboveCongratulations & Have fun!

entry.title: GitHub Pages with Hexo
entry.content: Deploy your Hexo Blog to GitHub PagesInstall hexo-deployer-git1$ npm install hexo-deployer-git --save Edit root _config.yml12345deploy: type: git repo: <repository url> #https://sawakonotsadako.github.io/ branch: [branch] #published (recommended master) message: [message] #leave this blank If your repository name has the type of yourname.github.io, please use master branch. Reason please refer to GitHub Help Upload your site12$ hexo clean$ hexo deploy Go to https://yourname.github.io for verification
